about_the_game:
What am I in for?

Welcome to the world of Endacopia! You're in for a surreal Point and Click Adventure full of unsolved mysteries, abstract puzzles, hostile monsters, and horrors that lurk in the shadows... if tampered with, of course. You'll be guiding a young boy named Mellow who has lost all his senses in an attempt to escape an uncomfortable home.

What do I do?

First and foremost, you'll need a functional keyboard and mouse to play this game. Once you've taken care of that, prepare yourself to use your brain for the following scenarios:
  • Decide which area to explore next in whichever order you'd like.
  • Use Mellow's bare fists to block, dodge, and punch monsters in first person perspective.
  • Have conversations with strange individuals who may or may not help you on your quests.
  • Fill your pockets with tools, toys, gadgets, and trash.
  • Try your luck at a variety of mini-games.
  • Gaze at an abundance of animated background gags.
  • Uncover disturbing secrets that were probably better left hidden.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes of body horror, psychological horror, distressing imagery, blood, violence, death, drugs, and jump-scares.
